method.name: Fuzzy-Rough Nearest Neighbor classifier - Vaguely Quantified Rough Sets

reference.ref: R. Jensen and C. Cornelis, Fuzzy-rough nearest neighbour classification, Transactions on Rough Sets, vol. 13, pp. 56-72, 2011.

generalDescription.howWork: This method is similar to FRNN-FRS, but uses vaguely quantified rough sets to model the lower and upper approximations of the nearest neighbors.

parameterSpec.param: K Value: K parameter in the k-NN voting rule.

method.example:
Problem type: Classification Method: FRNN_VQRS-C Dataset: appendicitis Test Show results: Vis-Clas-Check Parameters: Default settings
After the execution of RunKeel.jar we can see into the Vis-Clas-Check results' file the classification results for the test set:
TEST RESULTS ============ Classifier= appendicitis Fold 0 : CORRECT=0.9090909090909091 N/C=0.0 Fold 1 : CORRECT=0.9090909090909091 N/C=0.0 Fold 2 : CORRECT=0.8181818181818181 N/C=0.0 Fold 3 : CORRECT=0.9090909090909091 N/C=0.0 Fold 4 : CORRECT=0.7272727272727273 N/C=0.0 Fold 5 : CORRECT=0.6363636363636364 N/C=0.0 Fold 6 : CORRECT=0.9 N/C=0.0 Fold 7 : CORRECT=0.8 N/C=0.0 Fold 8 : CORRECT=0.7 N/C=0.0 Fold 9 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.1690909090909091 stddev Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.1088785812478536 Correctly classified: 0.8309090909090909 Global N/C: 0.0
